Items.Title: Resolution urging the Federal Communications Commission to open a formal comment period on the Commission’s TV white space test report to enable all stakeholders to thoroughly review the data and comment, and to set aside a sufficient number of broadcast channels for the exclusive use of wireless microphone in order to protect all incumbent wireless microphone users.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Refrain from implementing proposed regulatory amendments that would allow portable devices to operate on the white space radio spectrum.
